title: Tech Stocks Set for More Losses After Nasdaq Sinks
sub_head: Global markets follow Wall Street lower, with technology shares retreating in Europe
body:
Technology stocks were poised for further losses at the opening bell after getting clobbered by investors concerned about likely interest-rate rises.
Futures for the technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 edged down 0.3% Thursday. On Wednesday, the Nasdaq Composite Index posted its biggest daily loss since February after minutes of the Federal Reserveâ€™s most recent meeting showed officials eyeing a faster timetable for raising rates. Futures for the broad-market S&P 500 slipped 0.2%, while contracts for the Dow Jones Industrial Average edged down less than 0.1%.
